html:
11.15.20  5:37 pm   How to accept imperfection as a necessary ingredient in my work?

      eventually you will get tired of the alternative. which i am guessing is nothing

11.15.20  5:26 pm   Do you write songs cause its fun or because you want to?

      for those 2 reasons and much more

11.15.20  4:09 pm   How do you make chocolate chip cookies?

      i have no idea

11.15.20  3:47 pm   Do you enjoy making songs?

      yes

11.15.20  3:29 pm   what should i do for my birthday

      get 24 hours older

11.15.20  2:49 pm   Are you creative?

      put it this way, i'm not entirely sure which way is up. i can hypothesize, but i've never been able to prove it

11.15.20  2:49 pm   Do you have a favorite key and/or BPM?

      no

11.15.20  2:29 pm   what is the best thing?

      ranking systems

11.15.20  2:29 pm   What is the meaning of most of your songs?

      to make you feel better. or worse, if you prefer

11.15.20  2:28 pm   how can you be both so evasive and so clear and specific in your answers at the same time?

      just trying to get a feel for the space

11.15.20  2:21 pm   What instrument did you use for the solo in "La de da de da de da de day oh?"?

     keyboard

      Also where did you get inspiration from for that song?

      the chorus was inspired by the pre-chorus. the pre-chorus was inspired by wanting to write a song. and the verse was inspired by feeling like i would never have enough time to express and do all the things i want to

11.15.20  1:59 pm   Do your songs actually have meaning, or is it just a smorgasbord of different odd ideas?

      i've tried to give them as much meaning as possible. the amount of meaning you've felt from it, is ultimately an indicator of how well i have done my job. so, if you can get back to me with those figures,

11.15.20  1:27 pm   i am really good at reverse psycology. what could i do with it? 

      you could try being bad at it

11.15.20  1:27 pm   what tempo is la de da de da de day oh

      just thinking about it now, i would estimate somewhere around 100

11.15.20  1:07 pm   What do you think of Canadians?

      they are very small compared to the actual size of their country. this leads me to believe there is potentially a lot of space in canada with no people in it

11.15.20  12:25 pm   Hey wassup bill I was looking at your YouTube channel and I was wondering what you were implying by your last video I might quit 

      'here is the new song, again i'm sorry it took 5 weeks instead of 2, i was actually trying to make it 1 week. gonna try again for next tuesday. i will get this'

11.15.20  12:04 pm   why did the chicken cross the road

      what my client (the chicken) and i are wondering is why was a road built across the chicken's path

11.15.20  11:23 am   What is your opinion on mustard

      a safe option for people who have the urge to eat paint

11.15.20  10:19 am   How do different sounds make nicer sounds together?

      niceness is a product of our consciousness. from what i can tell, the way this game usually works is by making patterns and breaking them. THIS INCLUDES establishing a pattern of how you break the patterns, and then also, if the mood strikes, breaking that pattern as well. So in this way, it's impossible to determine if any 1 item is nice, or if any 2 items together are nice. i can promise you, for as many situations as you might find where 2 items seems nicer than one, there is also a similar sister-scenario out there where 1 thing seems nicer than 2. And it's really the process of Time/Space which allows these effects to unfold

11.15.20  10:14 am   how do you move on from a song? How do u accept that a song is completed instead of coming back and constantly changing it?

      it depends how badly you want the song to be done

11.15.20  9:09 am   is it a good idea to make songs about random objects

      could be a nice exercise

11.15.20  8:57 am   I want to record my own songs but am always discouraged by my silly voice and bad singing, how do I get over this?

      i guess it depends on how badly you want it

11.15.20  8:39 am   Is the song making process really the one described in the 'slow down' video (solo bit)

     no

      and if so do you have a specific lake you recommend for songwriting?

11.15.20  7:43 am   should we combine jupiter and saturn to make jaturn

      i dare you to try

11.15.20  6:53 am   is your next video going to include the words
"i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes"

      no

11.15.20  5:22 am   did you ever get the heating time of your porridge right?

      not yet

11.15.20  5:11 am   When is your next video 

      at the usual time

11.15.20  4:35 am   What is bigger? The universe or the Internet? 

      the universe

11.15.20  2:49 am   Bill, what is your current situation? I kinda started crying over your "might quit" video so I just wanned to know.. 

      basically it's like when you're in the circus, and your circus gets too big for the circus. so you have to build a bigger circus. then you find out, building circuses is totally impossible, which reminds me of how impossible it was to build the previous circus. but that's good news, because it reminds me that i was able to build that impossible circus, in addition to a variety of other sub-circuses since then

11.15.20  1:11 am   Will you ever run out of ideas?

      that is scientifically impossible

11.15.20  12:57 am   Now that you have time to say the things you wanna say, what do you wanna say?

      everything, which unfortunately i still don't have time for. my theory is that i still do have time to say SOME things, which is a theory i have been following religiously for many years now, through thick and thin

11.15.20  12:37 am   Are you ever going to complete the reality section?

      i will try

11.15.20  12:20 am   When you first started making HOTEWIG, how long of a video did you expect it would be?

      somewhere between 5 and 10 minutes

11.14.20  10:56 pm   do you feel that your success has put pressure on your creative process? e.g. you feel hesitant to post a video, that in beginning you wouldn't think twice

      i continue to think my normal amount, of 2 million times

11.14.20  10:20 pm   Do you have any feelings about the chord Gmaj7? 

      if you hear it, as the first thing in a song, before you hear anything else, you might care to estimate that there is a about a 60% chance the song is in D

11.14.20  10:01 pm   when do you think the world will end? 

      it is constantly ending and starting all the time

11.14.20  8:13 pm   About how many hours of actual work does it take to make one of your music videos?

      it depends if the video is long, and if i'm an idiot. if both are true, then it takes a really long time

11.14.20  8:02 pm   Are you gonna make an new album?
You don't got to make new vids
But... Your songs are quite a bop to hear

      i will be doing songs, and also videos

11.14.20  7:52 pm   Do you think there's a difference between a banger, a bop, and a jam?

      there's differences between everything

11.14.20  7:26 pm   in "at the airport terminal" you used a minor IV chord (Bbm6?). what are your thoughts on the minor IV chord?

      it's normal. can be used in normal every day life, throughout town. like when a store appears to be open and closed at the same time, and it tugs at your heartstrings for a lingeringly brief moment of eternity

11.14.20  7:21 pm   How long does It take you to make each video?

     i have a new company policy which says videos should only take a reasonable amount of time

      Especially with some of the long ones, I would think it would be months of time. 

     sometimes even the medium sized ones take months. this is not fair to anyone, but i am looking to increase my intelligence, which will hopefully solve the problem

11.14.20  6:55 pm   How do you make your songs so catchy? 

      i'm still trying to figure out

11.14.20  6:44 pm   What is the script for history of the entire world i guess?

      almost exactly the words i ended up delivering in the final vocal track

11.14.20  6:42 pm   how does one master the "bad foot tap" from "I just did a bad thing?

      basically the way you do it is you try to do a video in a much shorter time than you think you can. then, in haste, just put on a shoe and point the camera at it. as soon as you get a take that is mildly coherent, drop that in the video and use linguistics to come up with a caption that makes the action seem important at that time

11.14.20  6:19 pm   Do you have tons of ideas that you throw away or do you pursue most of them?

      so far there hasn't been enough time to pursue all of them, but they are not thrown away

11.14.20  6:14 pm   Why do you think people like your videos?

      some of them are good and bad at the same time

11.14.20  6:01 pm   do you know when you are gonna release the video you are working on?

      i know when i would like to release it. april 8, 2019 would have been the preferred time. and each day after that becomes slightly less of a prefered time, but still, admittedly, heaps better than never

11.14.20  5:56 pm   what is your most proud creation from your videos,songs etc?

      i would prefer to make many new ones to be proud of

11.14.20  4:38 pm   what happens when you go to the airport terminal

      i haven't been there in a long time. but, back in the good old days, i remember walking through the corridors and finding the correct plane which corresponded to my ticket, and maybe purchasing some name-brand meal items, at 2x price but with 2x nostalgia

11.14.20  4:29 pm   Is your song "Outside" in any way a statement or comment on your status as an outside artist?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes
